chatbot_scope.purpose: Catalog of RAG types and assistant templates to answer how it works and capabilities

documents.title: Basic RAG
documents.content: Basic RAG combines retrieval and generation. It splits text into chunks, embeds them as vectors, retrieves the Top‑K most relevant chunks for a query, and generates an answer using that context with citations.

documents.title: Hybrid RAG
documents.content: Hybrid RAG improves recall and precision by combining keyword search (e.g., BM25) with vector search. Scores are blended, results deduplicated and re-ranked to capture exact terms and semantic meaning together.

documents.title: Conversational RAG
documents.content: Conversational RAG maintains dialogue state across turns. It retrieves new context per message and summarizes memory so the assistant can remain consistent and helpful during multi-turn conversations.

documents.title: Multimodal RAG
documents.content: Multimodal RAG retrieves and reasons over text, images, audio, or video together. It uses modality-specific embeddings and cross‑modal retrieval to answer questions requiring multiple content types.

documents.title: Structured RAG
documents.content: Structured RAG is schema-aware for tables and databases. It blends SQL or tabular results with textual context, enabling precise answers from reports and dashboards.

documents.title: Knowledge Graph RAG
documents.content: Knowledge Graph RAG leverages entity relationships via graph traversal and path‑aware context selection. It yields precise answers for compliance and entity relation queries.

documents.title: Agentic RAG
documents.content: Agentic RAG adds planning and tool use to retrieval. A planner decides actions, calls tools and iterates with retrieval to accomplish complex research or automation tasks.

documents.title: Real‑time RAG
documents.content: Real‑time RAG ingests new data continuously and answers with fresh content. It uses streaming ingestion and ephemeral caches to serve up-to-date results for news or operational alerts.

documents.title: Personalized RAG
documents.content: Personalized RAG incorporates user profiles and preferences during retrieval. It indexes and scopes content by audience to support portals and personalized learning.

documents.title: Cross‑lingual RAG
documents.content: Cross‑lingual RAG retrieves and answers across languages using multilingual embeddings and optional translation. It suits global sites and multilingual support.

documents.title: Voice RAG
documents.content: Voice RAG integrates speech-to-text and text-to-speech with retrieval and citations. It supports kiosks, hotlines, and accessibility features.

documents.title: Citation RAG
documents.content: Citation RAG emphasizes evidence with chunk-level identifiers and inline references. It is ideal for knowledge pages and audits where traceability matters.

documents.title: Guardrailed RAG
documents.content: Guardrailed RAG enforces topic allow/deny lists and safety checks. It ensures enterprise and healthcare assistants follow policy constraints.

documents.title: FAQ Bot
documents.content: The FAQ Bot answers common questions using RAG context and citations. It is suitable for websites and customer portals where quick answers are required.

documents.title: Customer Support
documents.content: Customer Support assistants provide troubleshooting with guided flows. They can escalate or create tickets while keeping answers grounded in documented procedures.

documents.title: Sales Assistant
documents.content: Sales assistants qualify leads and suggest offerings based on RAG context. They help create quotes and recommend packages while staying aligned to product information.

documents.title: HR Assistant
documents.content: HR assistants answer questions about policies, benefits, and careers. They guide candidates through application steps and provide compliant responses.

documents.title: Internal Search
documents.content: Internal Search assistants quickly locate SOPs and internal documents across shared drives and wikis, providing relevant excerpts and links.

documents.title: Document Q&A
documents.content: Document Q&A assistants answer questions across PDFs and manuals. They can summarize sections and cite the exact source lines.

documents.title: Data Analyst
documents.content: Data Analyst assistants explain KPIs and trends in plain language. They help stakeholders understand metrics and time-series behavior.

documents.title: Compliance Advisor
documents.content: Compliance advisors support policy lookups, audit preparation, and risk checks. They ensure responses align with regulatory frameworks.
